A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fantastic. A worthy addition to the Star Wars canon. Saw it in 3D\, so wild! I don't understand all the complaints about the story\, especially Luke's story arc. I read all the reviews\, including spoilers\, and still came away very satisfied as a lifelong Star Wars fan. A very welcome and satisfying cameo ties Luke's story together. If people want Star Wars movies stricken from the Canon\, it should be the garbage episodes 1 through 3.
